tool_description: Constructs complete measurement traceability chain from instrument through reference standards to national/international standards, validating each link.

instrument_id.description: Unique identifier of the measurement instrument

error_messages: Array length mismatch: calibration_certificates, reference_standards, and laboratory_codes must have equal length.
Invalid certificate number: Certificate format not recognized or certificate not found.
Broken traceability chain: Gap detected in traceability path to national standards.
Expired certificates: One or more certificates in chain have expired.
Insufficient uncertainty ratio: Uncertainty ratios between levels do not meet 3:1 or 4:1 requirements.
Unaccredited laboratory: Laboratory not recognized in international database.
Parameter mismatch: Measurement parameter inconsistent through traceability chain.
usage: Provide instrument ID, array of certificates, reference standards, and laboratory codes. Tool validates chain integrity and calculates cumulative uncertainty.

chain_validity.description: Whether complete traceability chain is valid

chain_levels.description: Number of levels in traceability chain

next_calibration_due.description: Earliest calibration due date in chain
